heading: Tur Dulra Stronghold â€“ Diablo 4
content: Tur Dulra Stronghold is a Stronghold in Scosglen, it can be found by searching with our . Strongholds are bastions of evil located around the world of Diablo 4. When you come across them, your task is to liberate them from the occupying hellspawn! As a reward, you get a big amount of and some turn into central hubs with Waypoints, some become inhabited with vendors and artisans or unlock new and follow the path towards the yellow circle until you reach the massive Tree. Red markings appear behind you, in the middle of it sits a Runestone, interact with it. Three red dots, marking the locations of Druid Spirits you need to free from their prison. Defeat the surrounding monsters, then interact with them. They turn into Elite Shamans using different elements, the Tormented Earth Druid, the Tormented Wind Druid, and the Tormented Poison Druid. Once you defeated all three, return to the Great Oak and face the that waits for you. Kill him to free
